message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.MM, cs.AR. 

The paper deals with optimization of channel capacity in indoor mmWave environments using reconfigurable intelligent surfaces (RISs). This involves studying the propagation environment and exploiting the customizing capabilities of the RIS reflection elements. The paper also proposes two optimization schemes and a low-complexity technique for determining phase shift values. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.IT (Information Theory), followed by cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture), cs.SY (Systems and Control), cs.MM (Multimedia), and cs.AR (Hardware Architecture).
